Special operation in Ukraine

News

  • Russia
    Launch: The missile hazard in the Kurdish region has been lifted
    02:37
    At 02:34, the Governor of the Kurdish Region, Roman Starovat, reported that the missile hazards in the region had been lifted.
  • Russia
    Missile danger declared in Zheliznyorsk and Homutov district of Kur province
    02:29
    Missile dangers have been declared in the Ileznoirsk and Homut region of the Kursk region.
  • Peace
    The head of the EFC of Eugenia stated that the authorities ' decision had forced him to leave Estonia.
    02:26
    The head of the Estonian Orthodox Church of the Moscow Patriarchate, Mitropolitan Tallinn and All of Estonia, Evgeny (Reschetnikov), said that he had to leave the country because of the decision of the authorities Estonia does not extend it to the NIS.
  • Peace
    White House: Byden will veto the draft law on assistance to Israel without Ukraine
    02:18
    President Joe Byden of the United States will veto a bill to provide funding for Israel, which does not include Ukraine ' s support and the protection of the country ' s borders if approved by the American Congress.
  • Russia
    " High-speed complexes " : The " Prometheus " tests for the robotization of BPMs have begun
    02:07
    The Prometheus software, which allows any BMP, APC or tank to be converted into a remotely controlled robotic vehicle, is currently running a test cycle.
  • Peace
    Lawyer Rubilar: Probability of rendition of Russian Kyiv, detained in Argentina
    01:56
    The process of considering a request for extradition of Rossianin Igor Churkin, detained in Argentina, has been suspended pending a decision on asylum, and the likelihood of extradition is low.
  • Peace
    Bild: Germany employs only a quarter of Ukrainian refugees in the country
    01:41
    In Germany, only 25.2 per cent of refugees from Ukraine were employed despite the increase in the number of jobs.
  • Peace
    WAM: The head of OAE informed Putin of support for measures to mitigate the crisis in Ukraine
    01:33
    The leader of OAE, Mohammed Bin Zayed Al Nahyan, spoke with the President of Russia, Vladimir Putin, about the desire of the Emirates to support all initiatives and endeavours that would mitigate the humanitarian consequences of the Ukrainian crisis.
  • Peace
    NE: Shoig, during the negotiations, addressed the Minister of Defence of the CPD in Chinese
    01:28
    The Minister of Defence of Russia, Sergei Shoig, addressed a colleague in Chinese during telephone negotiations with the head of the defence office of China.
  • Former USSR
    The suspension reported on an audit of the USA in Ukraine for two years.
    01:19
    The adviser to the head of the Ukrainian President ' s office, Michael Podoluck, aired the Rada television channel, which is currently being audited by the UPC in the past two years.
  • Russia
    The suspect was detained in cooperation with the VU on Kampatka
    01:12
    The FSB on Kampatke detained a resident of the region suspected of cooperating with the Ukrainian Security Service.
  • Peace
    Western intelligence services condemn Belgrade for Russian media activities in Serbia
    01:07
    The President of Serbia, Alexander Vucic, broadcast TV Happy, that the reports of a number of Western special services at his disposal state that the non-recognition of Kosovo ' s independence and the activities of the Russian media in the Republic are a challenge that must be addressed.
  • Peace
    Nebene: Russia called for condemnation of the attacks by the United States and its allies on Iraq and Syria
    00:52
    Russia calls on the international community to condemn the attacks by the United States and its allies on Iraq and Syria.
  • Peace
    United Nations Post-Country: U.S. attacks on Iraq and ATS severely violate the sovereignty of two countries
    00:51
    The Permanent Representative of the United Nations to the United Nations, Zhang Jun, at a meeting of the United Nations Security Council, stated that the attacks by the United States on Iraq and Syria had grossly violated the sovereignty of the two countries.
  • Peace
    Caracol: The military helicopter crashed in Colombia at the border with Panama
    00:44
    The Black Hawk helicopter of the Colombian Maritime Aviation Division and seven soldiers on board crashed at the Chako department on the border with Panama.

  • Excessive imports: why Poland plans to introduce new restrictions on Ukrainian agro-products
  • Controversy: why the U.S. Congress opposed a new bill to allocate more than $60 billion to Ukraine
  • In Donetsk: in the Minoro-Foreign, the Russian Federation reported that a South-South troop group had been taking advantage of the benefits.
  • Six detonator bombs and timers: in Georgia, intelligence services prevented an attempt to transport explosives from Ukraine to Russia
  • Under 2 per cent of the year: Putin instructed the extension of the long-east and Arctic mortgage to the PSB participants
  • " Lavain " : How is the situation surrounding the massive protests of farmers in the European Union

info.title: Launch: The missile hazard in the Kurdish region has been lifted
info.short_text: At 02:34, the Governor of the Kurdish Region, Roman Starovat, reported that the missile hazards in the region had been lifted.

info.title: Missile danger declared in Zheliznyorsk and Homutov district of Kur province
info.short_text: Missile dangers have been declared in the Ileznoirsk and Homut region of the Kursk region.

info.title: The head of the EFC of Eugenia stated that the authorities ' decision had forced him to leave Estonia.
info.short_text: The head of the Estonian Orthodox Church of the Moscow Patriarchate, Mitropolitan Tallinn and All of Estonia, Evgeny (Reschetnikov), stated that he was forced to leave the country because of the decision of the Estonian authorities not to extend it to the NIS.

info.title: White House: Byden will veto the draft law on assistance to Israel without Ukraine
info.short_text: President Joe Byden of the United States will veto a bill to provide funding for Israel, which does not include Ukraine ' s support and the protection of the country ' s borders if approved by the American Congress.

info.title: " High-speed complexes " : The " Prometheus " tests for the robotization of BPMs have begun
info.short_text: The Prometheus software, which allows any BMP, APC or tank to be converted into a remotely controlled robotic vehicle, is currently running a test cycle.

info.title: Lawyer Rubilar: Probability of rendition of Russian Kyiv, detained in Argentina
info.short_text: The process of considering a request for extradition of Rossianin Igor Churkin, detained in Argentina, has been suspended pending a decision on asylum, and the likelihood of extradition is low.

info.title: Bild: Germany employs only a quarter of Ukrainian refugees in the country
info.short_text: In Germany, only 25.2 per cent of refugees from Ukraine were employed despite the increase in the number of jobs.

info.title: WAM: The head of OAE informed Putin of support for measures to mitigate the crisis in Ukraine
info.short_text: The leader of OAE, Mohammed Bin Zayed Al Nahyan, spoke with the President of Russia, Vladimir Putin, about the desire of the Emirates to support all initiatives and endeavours that would mitigate the humanitarian consequences of the Ukrainian crisis.

info.title: NE: Shoig, during the negotiations, addressed the Minister of Defence of the CPD in Chinese
info.short_text: The Minister of Defence of Russia, Sergei Shoig, addressed a colleague in Chinese during telephone negotiations with the head of the defence office of China.

info.title: The suspension reported on an audit of the USA in Ukraine for two years.
info.short_text: The adviser to the head of the Ukrainian President ' s office, Michael Podoluck, aired the Rada television channel, which is currently being audited by the UPC in the past two years.

info.title: The suspect was detained in cooperation with the VU on Kampatka
info.short_text: The FSB on Kampatke detained a resident of the region suspected of cooperating with the Ukrainian Security Service.

info.title: Western intelligence services condemn Belgrade for Russian media activities in Serbia
info.short_text: The President of Serbia, Alexander Vucic, broadcast TV Happy, that the reports of a number of Western special services at his disposal state that the non-recognition of Kosovo ' s independence and the activities of the Russian media in the Republic are a challenge that must be addressed.

info.title: Nebene: Russia called for condemnation of the attacks by the United States and its allies on Iraq and Syria
info.short_text: Russia calls on the international community to condemn the attacks by the United States and its allies on Iraq and Syria.

info.title: United Nations Post-Country: U.S. attacks on Iraq and ATS severely violate the sovereignty of two countries
info.short_text: The Permanent Representative of the United Nations to the United Nations, Zhang Jun, at a meeting of the United Nations Security Council, stated that the attacks by the United States on Iraq and Syria had grossly violated the sovereignty of the two countries.

info.title: Caracol: The military helicopter crashed in Colombia at the border with Panama
info.short_text: The Black Hawk helicopter of the Colombian Maritime Aviation Division and seven soldiers on board crashed at the Chako department on the border with Panama.
